title: CLANNAD - Legend - SOUNDTRACK [FLAC] 1984
description:
The " Legend " - the musical album of group Clannad with year 1984, folding with 10 used works as sound-track in British serial "Robin of Sherwood". 
  
Was the former album group, in which textual layer did not it be create in Gaelic, but in English.

  Only 10 tunes on plate are, despite that in serial to hear them it it is possible several times more, in instrumental majorities, 
  because Clannad foundation created sound to serial with new tunes also in second and third season, since year 1984 to 1986.
